Kafka Producer destinationdata formatsdata formatsKafka Producer destinationsKafka Producer writes data to Kafka based on the data format that you select. You can use the following data formats:
Avro The destination writes records based on the Avro schema that you provide. You can optionally include the schema definition as part of the Kafka message. Omitting the schema definition can improve performance, but requires the appropriate schema management to avoid losing track of the schema associated with the data.
